About Me

Building scalable systems with modern technologies

I'm a passionate software engineer specializing in back-end development, microservices architecture, and AI integration. Currently pursuing my PhD in Software Engineering and E-Business, focusing on the application of AI in microservice architectures. With expertise in Spring Boot, cloud technologies, and DevOps practices, I build robust, scalable solutions for complex problems.
